briefTitle: Application Of Epirubicin Within A Neo-/Adjuvant Chemotherapy In Patients With Primary Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Application Of Epirubicin Within A Neo-/Adjuvant Chemotherapy In Patients With Primary Breast Cancer ((ANWENDUNGSBEOBACHTUNG,MOI 99056 -Neo-/Adjuvante Chemotherapie Des Primären Mammakarzinoms Der Frau Mit Farmorubicin®))
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of Participants With Disease Free Survival (DFS)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Pre- and postmenopausal female patients with histologically confirmed primary breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic breast cancer, locally advanced or recurrent breast cancer, previous cancer history
